# Aavegotchi Wiki Full Index (wiki.aavegotchi.com)

Comprehensive page index for AI systems. Generated from `posts/en/*.md` in the wiki repository.

- Aambassadors — https://wiki.aavegotchi.com/aambassador — Meet the Aavegotchi Aambassadors, community contributors driving education, outreach, and ecosystem growth across regions and channels.
- Aarcade Taask Force — https://wiki.aavegotchi.com/aarcade-taask-force — Historical overview of the Aarcade Taask Force, a community group that supported mini-game strategy, feedback loops, and ecosystem planning.
- Aavegotchi Aarchitect — https://wiki.aavegotchi.com/aarchitect — Meet Aavegotchi Aarchitect contributors building mini-games, analytics tools, and technical infrastructure across the ecosystem.
- Aarena (Legacy) — https://wiki.aavegotchi.com/aarena — Historical reference for the Gotchiverse Aarena concept, including early mechanics, lore context, and links to related battle docs.
- Aavegotchi Aartists — https://wiki.aavegotchi.com/aartist — Meet Aavegotchi Aartists and explore community-made art, featured creators, and visual contributions across the Gotchiverse.
- Aauction House — https://wiki.aavegotchi.com/aauction — Historical guide to the Aavegotchi Aauction House, including auction flow, bid mechanics, and links to current marketplace resources.
- Aavegotchi Improvement Proposals (AGIPs) — https://wiki.aavegotchi.com/aavegotchi-improvement-proposals-2020 — Archive of Aavegotchi Improvement Proposals (AGIPs) for 2020, including proposal context, voting windows, and recorded outcomes.
- Aavegotchi Improvement Proposals (AGIPs) — https://wiki.aavegotchi.com/aavegotchi-improvement-proposals-2021 — Archive of Aavegotchi Improvement Proposals (AGIPs) for 2021, including proposal context, voting windows, and recorded outcomes.
- Aavegotchi Improvement Proposals (AGIPs) — https://wiki.aavegotchi.com/aavegotchi-improvement-proposals-2022 — Archive of Aavegotchi Improvement Proposals (AGIPs) for 2022, including proposal context, voting windows, and recorded outcomes.
- Aavegotchi Improvement Proposals (AGIPs) — https://wiki.aavegotchi.com/aavegotchi-improvement-proposals-2023 — Archive of Aavegotchi Improvement Proposals (AGIPs) for 2023, including proposal context, voting windows, and recorded outcomes.
- Aavegotchi Improvement Proposals (AGIPs) — https://wiki.aavegotchi.com/aavegotchi-improvement-proposals — Central index of Aavegotchi Improvement Proposals (AGIPs), with links to yearly archives, proposal history, and governance references.
- Aavegotchi Profile — https://wiki.aavegotchi.com/aavegotchi-profile — Overview of the Aavegotchi profile page, including core stats, equipped wearables, and how profile traits affect gameplay.
- Aesthetica — https://wiki.aavegotchi.com/aesthetica — Learn what Aesthetica items are in the Gotchiverse and how cosmetic parcel decorations differ from gameplay-affecting installations.
- Agents — https://wiki.aavegotchi.com/agents — Track Aavegotchi agent initiatives, mission systems, and autonomous onchain experimentation tied to gameplay and social campaigns.
- Aging Mechanic — https://wiki.aavegotchi.com/aging-mechanic — Understand the Aavegotchi aging mechanic, life stages, and how age progression affects visuals, lore, and player expectations.
- Alchemical Channeling — https://wiki.aavegotchi.com/alchemical-channeling — Learn how Alchemical Channeling works in the Gotchiverse, including daily yield mechanics, kinship interaction, and optimization tips.
- aTokens (Spirit Force) — https://wiki.aavegotchi.com/atokens — Spirit Force / collateral tokens used by Aavegotchis (aTokens, maTokens, amTokens)
- Aavegotchi Baadges — https://wiki.aavegotchi.com/baadge — Guide to Aavegotchi Baadges, non-transferable commemorative NFTs earned through events, governance participation, and ecosystem milestones.
- Aavegotchi Baard — https://wiki.aavegotchi.com/baard — Explore Aavegotchi Baards, a community archive of gotchi-style poems, wordplay, and lore-friendly creative submissions.
- Baazaar (Legacy Alias) — https://wiki.aavegotchi.com/baazaar — Legacy alias page for the Aavegotchi Baazaar. Use this route to find the canonical Marketplace docs and current Base-era trading links.
- Migration to Base (2025) — https://wiki.aavegotchi.com/base-migration — Historical notes and durable facts from the 2025 Polygon -> Base migration
- Bridges — https://wiki.aavegotchi.com/bridge — The Aavegotchi Bridge (and other bridges to transfer assets to and from Base, plus legacy Polygon)
- Contests — https://wiki.aavegotchi.com/contests — Archive of Aavegotchi community contests, winners, and event highlights, with references to creative competitions and prize campaigns.
- Aavegotchi Contracts Addresses — https://wiki.aavegotchi.com/contracts — Canonical index of Aavegotchi smart contract addresses, with Base-era deployment references and verification links for safe interactions.
- Bonding Curve — https://wiki.aavegotchi.com/curve — Learn how the GHST bonding curve works, including price-supply mechanics, treasury effects, and historical tokenomics context.
- DAO Treasury Taask Force — https://wiki.aavegotchi.com/dao-treasury-taask-force — Historical overview of the DAO Treasury Taask Force and its role in treasury strategy, proposal research, and governance recommendations.
- AavegotchiDAO — https://wiki.aavegotchi.com/dao — Guide to AavegotchiDAO governance, including AGIPs, voting process, treasury decisions, and how token holders shape ecosystem direction.
- Developing Aavegotchi — https://wiki.aavegotchi.com/developers — Developer entry point for contributing to the Aavegotchi Wiki, with repository workflow notes, contribution guidelines, and support channels.
- Aavegotchi Wiki Directory — https://wiki.aavegotchi.com/directory — Complete directory of Aavegotchi Wiki pages to help you navigate gameplay, governance, contracts, tokenomics, and ecosystem resources.
- DROPT - The Fallen Gotchi — https://wiki.aavegotchi.com/dropt — Overview of DROPT: The Fallen Gotchi, including game concept, team background, and links for players tracking development updates.
- Estaates — https://wiki.aavegotchi.com/estaates — Learn how Gotchiverse Estaates combine multiple REALM parcels, enabling shared build zones, expanded layouts, and cooperative management.
- Aavegotchi Eye Shape — https://wiki.aavegotchi.com/eye-shape — Reference list of Aavegotchi eye shapes (EYS), with trait mapping context for rarity scoring, aesthetics, and collectible identity.
- FAQ — https://wiki.aavegotchi.com/faq — Quick answers to common Aavegotchi questions, including onboarding, gameplay basics, Base-era migration context, and support resources.
- The Forge — https://wiki.aavegotchi.com/forge — Light the furnace and grab your hammers. It’s time to craft some wearables!
- Gaame Jaam — https://wiki.aavegotchi.com/gaame-jaam — Historical archive for the Aavegotchi Gaame Jaam, covering hackathon themes, submissions, and community-built game prototypes.
- Game Center — https://wiki.aavegotchi.com/games — Hub page for Aavegotchi games across the ecosystem, with links to active titles, gameplay docs, and community experiences.
- Geist (historical) — https://wiki.aavegotchi.com/geist — Geist (aka Gotchichain) was announced as an Aavegotchi gaming chain concept; it ultimately did not launch.
- GHST Token — https://wiki.aavegotchi.com/ghst — Learn about GHST, the Aavegotchi ecosystem token used for governance, trading, utility payments, and core onchain game interactions.
- Glossary — https://wiki.aavegotchi.com/glossary — Glossary of Aavegotchi, NFT, and DeFi terminology, including Base-era definitions and historical Polygon-era terms for context.
- Gotchi Battler — https://wiki.aavegotchi.com/gotchi-battler — Overview of Gotchi Battler gameplay, team setup, combat loop, and reward context for players exploring Aavegotchi auto-battler modes.
- Gotchi Guardians — https://wiki.aavegotchi.com/gotchi-guardians — Official Gotchi Guardians hub: where to play (Steam + browser), rewards, and key links
- Gotchi Heroes — https://wiki.aavegotchi.com/gotchi-heroes — Overview of Gotchi Heroes, an idle-style game where your Aavegotchi fights waves, progresses heroes, and earns ecosystem rewards.
- Gotchi Lending — https://wiki.aavegotchi.com/gotchi-lending — Guide to Gotchi Lending for borrowers and lenders, covering listing flow, rental terms, and gameplay utility for borrowed gotchis.
- Gotchichain (historical) — https://wiki.aavegotchi.com/gotchichain — Gotchichain was announced as an Aavegotchi gaming chain concept in 2023; it ultimately did not launch.
- Gotchiverse Game Bible (Historical) — https://wiki.aavegotchi.com/gotchiverse-game-bible — Historical notes on the Gotchiverse Game Bible design document and its chapter governance process
- Gotchiverse — https://wiki.aavegotchi.com/gotchiverse — Comprehensive Gotchiverse guide covering REALM zones, parcels, Alchemica systems, gameplay loops, and Base-era migration context.
- Gotchus Alchemica Exchange (GAX) — https://wiki.aavegotchi.com/gotchus-alchemica-exchange — Guide to the Gotchus Alchemica Exchange (GAX), including historical mechanics and references to current Base-era token flows.
- Gotchus Alchemica — https://wiki.aavegotchi.com/gotchus-alchemica — Learn the four Gotchus Alchemica resources, their role in Gotchiverse crafting and economy, and how players acquire and use them.
- Aavegotchi Guilds — https://wiki.aavegotchi.com/guild — Overview of Aavegotchi Guilds, including social coordination tools, guild structures, and historical Gotchi Lodge mechanics.
- Haunts — https://wiki.aavegotchi.com/haunt — Learn how Aavegotchi Haunts define NFT generations, supply waves, and differences between legacy and newer Gotchi cohorts.
- Aavegotchi Wiki — https://wiki.aavegotchi.com/ — Official Aavegotchi Wiki homepage with curated links to core docs on GHST, Gotchiverse, governance, contracts, and Base migration.
